title.en: Lazy E Feed Express Cake Feeder

description.en:
When you have cows in hills and hollers, there is no point to bring a mixer truck out.
That's where the Lazy E Manufacturing Feed Express Cake feeder comes in at.
With adjustable hitch to allow it to match to any truck, along with a attach node, which allows you to keep the Feed Express on your truck as you can attach a gooseneck trailer still.
Mod Infomation: Name: Lazy E Feed Express Cake Box Function: Feeder Store Location: Tools > Trailers Price: $4000 Colors: Black, Grey, Cream, White, Red, Blue, Yellow, Green
